channel.title: Old news, but an interesting read if you haven't already [bin Laden]
channel.description:
Online document: the full text of Osama bin Laden's "letter to the American people", reported in today's Observer. The letter first appeared on the internet in Arabic and has since been translated and circulated by Islamists in Britain.
http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2002/nov/24/theobserver

item.title: Old news, but an interesting read if you haven't already [bin Laden]
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

Yes, I read it, he could of came up with a better thesis statement. Maybe you can point out some key points on why you support this letter?

sinisoul basically said it

Read full topic
item.source: Old news, but an interesting read if you haven't already [bin Laden]

item.title: Old news, but an interesting read if you haven't already [bin Laden]
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

Yes, I read it, he could of came up with a better thesis statement. Maybe you can point out some key points on why you support this letter?

I agree on the points that we should probably should not have gotten involved with Palestine and gave the go ahead for Israel to be created without sitting down and thinking of the repercussions. Although, this letter is highly anti-semitic, and very bias towards to an extremist muslim agenda. Which is to be expected of course. So I don’t have much sympathy towards it. I’m actually highly against it because I don’t follow a religion. Sort of chuckled when I read the part about homosexuality being evil. Sounds a little close to home.

Read full topic

Just a few more reasons for why we should continue to bomb the fuck out of them.
[/quote]
did you read it?[/quote]He’s probably American. We just hear what we want to, then start fuckin’ shit up.

item.description:

Interesting. I saw this earlier and I’ll just post here rather than make a new thread. (It’s just the model the special forces used to plan the Osama attack is now on show at the pentagon.)

http://news.yahoo.com/osama-bin-laden-compound-model-display-pentagon-184342390--abc-news-politics.html
